sentences.en: A farmer must plow the land before planting crops.
sentences.cn: 农民在种庄稼前必须犁地.

sentences.en: A Texas farmer grumbled that he had to plow his field.
sentences.cn: 有位得克萨斯州的农场主嘟嘟囔囔地说,他得耕自己的地.

sentences.en: Aggressive lugs let you plow through dirt and mud.
sentences.cn: 侵略性派让你犁通过污物和泥土.

sentences.en: At this time of the year farmer plow their field.
sentences.cn: 在一年中的这个时候农夫们会耕作他们的土地.

sentences.en: At this time of the year farmers begin to plow their fields.
sentences.cn: 每年这个时候,农民们开始犁地.

sentences.en: At this time of the year farmers plow their fields.
sentences.cn: 每年这个时候农民们都在耕地.

sentences.en: Better that I'd learned to plow or chop cotton like a darky.
sentences.cn: 还不如当初象黑人那样学会犁田、摘棉花呢.

sentences.en: Farmers now use tractors to plow their fields.
sentences.cn: 现今农民用牵引机耕地.

sentences.en: Farmers occassionally plow up old indian relics.
sentences.cn: 农民偶尔能用犁翻出古老的印第安人的遗物.

sentences.en: Farmers plow their fields and sow in spring.
He teamed one horse and one cow to a plow.
sentences.cn: 他把一匹马和一头牛套在犁上。

sentences.en: In 1930, a farmer with a tractor-pulled plow, combine, and truck could do the job in 20 hours.
sentences.cn: 1930年，农民使用拖拉机牵引的犁、联合收割机和卡车只需20小时便可完成这些工作。

sentences.en: The huge animals use their heads like a plow to push snow aside in search of food.
sentences.cn: 这些庞大的动物在找食物时用他们的头像犁一样将雪推到一边。

sentences.en: The plow was pulled by a yoke of oxen.
sentences.cn: 一对公牛同轭拉着一头犁.

sentences.en: The record of the plow was insignificant.
sentences.cn: 这个耕作的记载是不重要的.

sentences.en: We will plow the field soon after the last frost.
sentences.cn: 最后一场霜过后,我们将马上耕田.

sentences.en: You're too weak for a plow, too clumsy for carrying the wicker!
sentences.cn: 让你耕地, 你太柔弱,拿着箩筐也笨手笨脚!
